name: GLOWING PONG
description:
Who does not know this arcade classic from the 70's? 

Now you can play it from the comfort of your home without the need for an internet connection!

➤ CONTROLS: 

◉ Player 1 (Left): 

➥ W = Up 

➥ S = Down 

◉ Player 2 (Right): 

➥ Up Arrow = Up 

➥ Down Arrow = Down 

➤ CONDITIONS TO WIN: 

◉ Get to score 3 points for the opposite side of your opponent to win the game.

➤ ART: 

◉ 2D with neon style.

- This game is not made for profit, it was developed as a practice to measure my knowledge.

- This game is inspired by the "Pong" game originally developed by Atari. The materials used in this game are not made by me, they belong to "Hooson" (YouTube Channel).
